Translations.Text: kichu'i naya, ami tadera kache satya paumchiyechi, ara tara to mithyabadi.

Allaha kona santana grahana karenani ebam tamra sathe kona mabuda ne'i. Thakale pratyeka mabuda nija nija srsti niye cale yeta ebam ekajana an'yajanera upara prabala haye yeta. Tara ya bale, ta theke allaha pabitra.
Tini drsya o adrsyera jnani. Tara sarika kare, tini ta theke urdhbe.
Balunah he amara palanakarta! Ye bisaye taderake oyada deya hayeche ta yadi amake dekhana
he amara palanakarta! Tabe apani amake gonahagara sampradayera antarbhukta karabena na.
Ami taderake ye bisayera oyada diyechi, ta apanake dekhate abasya'i saksama.
Mandera ja'oyabe ta'i baluna, ya uttama. Tara ya bale, ami se bisaye sabisesa abagata.
Balunah he amara palanakarta! Ami sayatanera prarocana theke apanara asraya prarthana kari
ebam he amara palanakarta! Amara nikata tadera upasthiti theke apanara asraya prarthana kari.
Yakhana tadera kara'o kache mrtyu ase, takhana se baleh he amara palanakarta! Amake punaraya (duniyate) prerana karuna.
Yate ami satkarma karate pari, ya ami karini. Kakhana'i naya, e to tara ekati kathara katha matra. Tadera samane parda ache punarut'thana dibasa paryanta.
Atahpara yakhana singaya phutkara deya habe, sedina tadera parasparika atniyatara bandhana thakabe na ebam eke aparake jijnasabada karabe na.
Yadera palla bhari habe, tara'i habe saphalakama
ebam yadera palla halka habe tara'i nijedera ksatisadhana kareche, tara doyakhe'i cirakala basabasa karabe.
Aguna tadera mukhamandala dagdha karabe ebam tara tate bibhatsa akara dharana karabe.
